name: com.loorix.spine-odin-extensions
description:
This plugin provides extensions for the spine-unity runtime and odin inspector cooperation.

Prerequisites:
It requires a working installation of the spine-unity runtime, version 4.1 and Odin Inspector 3.1.
(See http://esotericsoftware.com/git/spine-runtimes/spine-unity and https://odininspector.com/)
